welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gross-Gerau, Germany! This charming city is known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance member airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Opened in 1994, this terminal serves mainly non-Star Alliance airlines and is connected to Terminal 1 by a SkyLine people mover.

terminals.name: Terminal 3 (under construction)
terminals.description: Currently under construction, this terminal is expected to open in 2023 and will serve mainly low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium high-speed WiFi is also available for a fee.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
